授業方法:
This course is held as a workshop with discussions, self-directed research and presentations, with communication and materials primarily in English.
*This course will be held on campus as a face-to-face lesson. However, if any students for this class have been granted permission to take classes online in 2021 due to underlying diseases, course materials and on-demand broadcast of data recorded from face-to-face classes will be made available on LUNA.
